definitions.definition: A supply ( especially a large one) of something kept for future use , specifically in case the cost of the item increases or if there a shortage .

subdefinitions.definition: A supply of nuclear weapons kept by a country ; a nuclear stockpile.

definitions.definition: A pile of coal or ore heaped up on the ground after it has been mined .

main_definition: A supply ( especially a large one) of something kept for future use , specifically in case the cost of the item increases or if there a shortage .
secondary_definitions: ( mining ) A pile of coal or ore heaped up on the ground after it has been mined .
